==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=りゅうめ}} {{m|zh|龍馬|tr=ljowng mæ<sup>X</sup>|lit=dragon + horse}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely the initial borrowing.
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|りゅう|め}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りゅうめ|shin=竜馬}}

# {{kyujitai spelling of|竜馬|lang=ja}}: [[excellent]] [[horse]]; [[promoted]] [[bishop]]

===Etymology 2===
Alteration of ''ryūme'' above, using the [[慣用音#Japanese|kan'yōon]] reading of ''ma'' for the {{ja-l|馬}} character.
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|りゅう|ま}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|りゅうま|kyu=龍馬}}

# {{kyujitai spelling of|竜馬|lang=ja}}: [[promoted]] [[bishop]]
